label: tools/list
raw_json: {"result":{"tools":[{"name":"current_time","description":"Get current time in UTC and specified timezone","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"format":{"type":"string","description":"The format for the returned time string (default: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)"},"timezone":{"type":"string","description":"The IANA timezone name (e.g., \"America/New_York\"). Defaults to server's guessed timezone"}},"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}},{"name":"relative_time","description":"Calculate relative time from now to a given time string","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"time":{"type":"string","description":"The time to compare (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss)"}},"required":["time"],"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}},{"name":"days_in_month","description":"Get the number of days in a month","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","description":"The date to check (format: YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to current date"}},"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}},{"name":"get_timestamp","description":"Convert a date-time string to Unix timestamp in milliseconds","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"time":{"type":"string","description":"The time to convert (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss). Defaults to current time"}},"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}},{"name":"convert_time","description":"Convert time between different IANA timezones","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"time":{"type":"string","description":"The time to convert (e.g., \"2025-03-23 12:30:00\")"},"sourceTimezone":{"type":"string","description":"Source IANA timezone name (e.g., \"Asia/Shanghai\")"},"targetTimezone":{"type":"string","description":"Target IANA timezone name (e.g., \"Europe/London\")"}},"required":["time","sourceTimezone","targetTimezone"],"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}},{"name":"get_week_year","description":"Get week number and ISO week number for a date","inputSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","description":"The date to check (e.g., \"2025-03-23\"). Defaults to current date"}},"additionalProperties":false,"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-07/schema#"},"execution":{"taskSupport":"forbidden"}}]},"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2}
